item.title: [Namada] Add Custom Queries for Validator Epoch Rewards
item.description:
Feature Description

Added custom RPC queries to extract on-chain data for validators and delegators. This feature specifically implements a query to retrieve the first block height by epoch, which is essential for calculating specific epoch rewards for validators.

item.title: [Namada] Add RPC Query for Validator Liveness
item.description:
Feature Description

Implemented a new RPC query function to check validators’ liveness (uptime). This feature allows validators to monitor their own performance and uptime directly through the RPC interface.

item.title: [Namada] Add Wallet Convert CLI Command
item.description:
Feature Description

Added a new CLI command wallet convert to the namadaw tool. This command facilitates the conversion of Tendermint key JSON files, streamlining the key management process for validators and users.
